Allaire And Macromedia To Merge

16 Jan 2001

\nAllaire (web app maker, creator of ColdFusion, HomeSite, and Spectra) will be merging with Macromedia (creator of Flash, Dreamweaver, etc.) For more information, here is the press release on Allaire.com:\n

http://www.allaire.com/handlers/index.cfm?ID=19390&Method=Full\n

\nAnd the PR on Macromedia.com:\n

\nhttp://www.macromedia.com/special/allaire/faq/
